attributes.title: A SCAMM
attributes.review: This app to at least 1 week to download and after it downloaded I leaked my nudes to the dark web then I had to buys them back for 1 mil each after years of saving up to buy them all They leaked more and after that I tried deleting the app and I couldn’t 5 mins later my phone blew up and I had to buy a new phone

attributes.title: INAPPROPRIATE
attributes.review: I came across this app because I’m a dedicated republican and supporter of Trump. First, the app took 3 HOURS to download. Somehow, it got access to my Facebook (I had no idea) and uploaded ALL of my VERY PERSONAL PHOTOS to my page!!! These were very private photos of me and my husband, and now MY GRANDCHILDREN HAVE SEEN US NAKED. To clarify, we were being amorous in these photos. CAN SOMEONE HELP ME?!?! I NEED THESE PHOTOS DELETED IMMEDIATELY!! MY GRANDCHILDREN ARE ASKING QUESTIONS THAT I CAN’T ANSWER!!

attributes.title: cute. 🤢🐠

Trump 2020 (but on a grave stone) 🤗🥰😌😘

attributes.title: HORRIBLE😡🤬😤
attributes.review: Once I downloaded the app, my phone started playing my least favorite song over, and over, and over. It wouldn’t stop so I tried to delete the app. When I did that I got a call from TRUMP HIMSELF. He told me that if I deleted the app, he would take my HOUSE!!! I got scared and eventually just smashed my phone. 0/10 experience. Would not recommend.

attributes.title: TERRIBLE.
attributes.review: As soon as I downloaded the app I was hacked. And everything was glitching. ALL my freaking information was STOLEN. AND the app was very unorganized, all over the place. Also my friends whose black downloaded the same app and the same thing happened to her. She emailed the app creators and they wouldn’t help her get back her information because of her skin color. ABSOLUTELY DISGUSTING. DONT BUY THIS APP.

attributes.title: tErRiBle aPp
attributes.review: this is is completely horrible it took 8 days to download😻. once it finally download it asked for my email which is completely inappropriate since the fat cheeto is already married😛. but i put it in anyway and i started receiving spam messages in my email which was completely annoying😘. i vote for sir noodle hair cheeto man 2020 in prison 🥰😽✨❤️

attributes.title: THIS
attributes.review: THIS APP IS WORSE THAN STEPPING ON A LEGO. I downloaded this app so that I could see what our “non fascist, non homophobic, non racist, and non misogynistic” president had to offer as an app. But it took YEARS to download and set a virus on my phone the minute I opened it. I later got a text message stating that if I wanted to keep me and my family in this country I would have to vote for trump 2020. I deleted the app IMMEDIATELY

attributes.title: Nasty
attributes.review: Worse app I have ever downloaded in my life. In thought I would celebrate our amazing, incredible, not racist, and not sexist president. However this app proved me wrong. When I finally downloaded it, the app crashed my phone and started displaying racist images and quotes all over my phone. I am severely disappointed with this app. Wish I could rate 0 stars.

attributes.title: Horrible!!!!!!!!!!!
attributes.review:
It took for ever to download this app.
And when I open it I notice that start to use my location, front camera and data with out permission. I think they recorded everything while I have this app in my phone. One time my internet browser, Twitter, and google maps open by himself. This is creepy and kind a ilegal

attributes.title: Horibble nasty smelling biatch
attributes.review: Horrible app! As soon as I opened it I was electrocuted and had to spend time in the hospital. I was then visited by an orange CHEETO on my screen and I am now in therapy for trauma from the experience. You will be hearing from my lawyer soon.
